name: Aggressive Shapes
description: Aggressive Shapes is a small arcade game that I got the idea of a couple of days ago and couldn't get it out of my head, so I have made this. In this game you are a hexagon constantly moving forward and towards where your mouse is pointing, you can also; shoot, pick up supplies, dash and survive as long as you can. Yes, in fact this is a casual arcade game, but it is also competitive, giving you a timer at the top of the screen and challenging you to survive as long as you can. Of course, you can adjust the enemy spawn-rate in the Options menu.
